channel.title: Built With Aurelia
channel.description: Latest submissions added to Built With Aurelia.

item.title: ABSOLUT Buenos Aireszz
item.description: The official website for the campaign of the limited ABSOLUT Buenos Aires bottle.

item.title: ag-Grid Aurelia Plugin
item.description: Enterprise strength datagrid that you can configure using Aurelia templating

item.title: AndreasLagerkvist.com
item.description: Personal portfolio of Andreas Lagerkvist

item.title: Arena of Titans
item.description: An online strategy game developed with the Aurelia Javascript framework

item.title: Artist Gallery
item.description: Aurelia / Materializecss Front End with seperate Sails-Mongodb backend

item.title: Aurelia Ace editor plugin
item.description: The aurelia-ace-editor is a custom element for Aurelia application. Which allows you easily embed an ace editor to your application.

item.title: Aurelia Api
item.description: Aurelia-api is a module wrapped around aurelia-fetch-client that allows you to perform the usual CRUD, supply criteria for your api, Manage more than one endpoint and more.

item.title: Aurelia Auth
item.description: Aurelia Auth is a plugin for adding in authentication to your Aurelia applications.

item.title: Aurelia Authentication
item.description: Token-based authentication with endpoint configurations, hooks, and much more.

item.title: Aurelia Bootstrap
item.description: Aurelia Bootstrap is a series of Custom Element and Custom Attributes that provide Bootstrap components native to Aurelia

item.title: Aurelia Datatable
item.description: A 100% aurelia based data table component.

item.title: Aurelia Filter
item.description: A plugin for aurelia to populate search/filter criteria based on user input. Works well with aurelia-orm.

item.title: Aurelia Flickr Memo Game
item.description: A match the pairs type of game written with Aurelia using Flickr as a source for the cards photos.

item.title: Aurelia Form
item.description: Leverage Aurelia's strengths, and create a standardized way of describing forms simply using objects and arrays.

item.title: Aurelia Gravatar Component
item.description: Simple gravatar component for Aurelia.

item.title: aurelia-highlightjs
item.description: Source code is mirrored on https://gitlab.com/r-w-x/aurelia-highlightjs

item.title: Aurelia Hub
item.description: The HUB is a place where Aurelia developers will come to learn, research, interact and gain access to all they need to be successful while building applications on the Aurelia platform. The hub itself is built on the Aurelia CLI (just like this site), however the source code is not currently public.

item.title: Aurelia Kendo UI Bridge
item.description: A set of Aurelia wrappers for Kendo UI.

item.title: Aurelia Knockout
item.description: Use Knockout binding language alongside Aurelia.

item.title: Aurelia Leaflet
item.description: An Aurelia plugin for adding Leaflet maps into your Aurelia applications.

item.title: Aurelia Materialize Bridge
item.description: Use Materialize components in your Aurelia application without writing any wrapper code. Powerful binding expressions directly in your markup

item.title: Aurelia MDL plugin
item.description: Material Design Lite plugin for Aurelia.

item.title: Aurelia Notification
item.description: A simple notification service with support for adapters.

item.title: Aurelia Orm
item.description: Makes working with entities and calling your Rest API simple.

item.title: Aurelia Pager
item.description: Pagination / pager module for aurelia.

item.title: Aurelia Piwik
item.description: This plugin is aimed to log page visit with Piwik on an Aurelia SPA. By default Piwik will only log the page on which the user arrived. With this plugin, all navigation events will be logged.

item.title: Aurelia Syncfusion Bridge
item.description: A set of Aurelia wrappers for Syncfusion Essential Studio for JavaScript.

item.title: Aurelia Table
item.description: Data Table plugin with many features out of the box. Created by @tochoromero

item.title: Aurelia View Manager
item.description: A view manager for aurelia plugins. Add support for overriding views, and multiple frameworks.

item.title: Aurelia works
item.description: A simple corporate website built on top of WordPress REST API.

item.title: Bariloche 2000
item.description: News site enterely made with Aurelia, designed to optimize the agency's productivity. It's backend is also made with Aurelia as well as the new mobile APP.

item.title: BeatMaker
item.description: A web audio synthesizer and drum machine (alpha)

item.title: Bouncer
item.description: An out-of-the-box list filter value converter for Aurelia. Bouncer makes it easy to hook up controls to filter any list in Aurelia. Created by @MatthewJames

item.title: Brainy
item.description: Brainy is an enterprise application that allows colleagues to know fellows' skills and share their own. It is used by know internally but the target is to share it with the world.

item.title: Brian Boru Fencing Club
item.description: A simple site for displaying information about a new fencing club in Ireland

item.title: citytax
item.description: Israel property-tax calculator מחשבון הארנונה של ישראל

item.title: creditcardwizard.co.nz
item.description:
Hi,
I've recently written this website as a tool to learn Aurelia. It was created using VS2015/asp.netcore/ef7/aurelia/jspm
The animation does use a Jquery plugin (https://mixitup.kunkalabs.com/) which is probably the most striking feature so I'm not sure if it eligible really? but the rest of the functionality the routing, http, bundling, binding, are fully Aurelia.
I'd be very happy to be included in the BuiltWithAurelia site.
Best Regards Mark

item.title: Datagrid
item.description: Proof-of-concept of an Aurelia datagrid that supports sorting, searching and custom rendering. Created by @RomkeVdMeulen

item.title: Debt Resolver
item.description: Take debt and minimize the number of necessary transactions to resolve it.

item.title: DotNetKicks
item.description: DNK is a community of experienced avid .NET programmers on the hunt to find and discuss .NET articles, libraries and frameworks. Occasionally we also publish interesting pieces plus we have discussions on whatever issues we run into.

item.title: eclub
item.description:
This is a multi tenant benefit club management platform. It is serving several customers and growing at a rate of 1 per week.
It is built using aurelia and the cli.
It went online one week before aurelia was released, so when aurelia 1 came out, we moved quickly from jspm to the cli.

item.title: elee.menu
item.description: elee.menu is for people who like to cook easily. It's a multiplatform web app that takes existing recipes from major cooking websites and guides the user through each step of the recipe. The recipes are in french only for the moment, and the selection is limited. It is still in Beta phase. Just enter something (or not) in the search field and hit Enter!

item.title: FarmTrack
item.description: Real-time vehicle tracking for the agricultural industry, providing high quality business analytics at an affordable price.

item.title: Gendalf.tv
item.description: Watch the Internet videos everywhere with your friends

item.title: GistRun
item.description: GistRun was created by Aurelia core team member Jeremy Danyow, it runs and edits GitHub Gists (surprise). GistRun is built with Aurelia, uses the GitHub API and is hosted on GitHub pages. CloudFlare provides DNS and Heroku hosts GistRun's integration with GitHub's OAuth web application flow.

item.title: Hacker News Clone
item.description: A recreation of the Hacker News website written in TypeScript and built using Aurelia, with webpack as a module bundler.

item.title: Aurelia Property Injection
item.description: An Aurelia Dependency Injection plugin to inject dependencies into instance properties.

item.title: Inspirato - Destination Map
item.description: Inspirato's destination map was created by members of the Inspirato development team in order to utilize cutting edge technology while highlighting all of the luxury vacation options Inspirato offers it's members. It is written in ES6 using TypeScript and utilizes the flux design pattern for state management.

item.title: JavaScriptKicks
item.description: http://JavaScriptKicks.com is a community based news site focused on JavaScript including #angularjs #reactjs #aureliajs #backbonejs #emberjs #es6 #nodejs

item.title: Kalimate
item.description: Kalimate.org est un outil permettant d’obtenir un clavier arabe virtuel en ligne gratuit pour écrire les mots et les phrase facilement. Le site propose des exercices, un lexique pour une revision et un apprentissage de la langue arabe - 2017.

item.title: Kchomp
item.description: Kchomp is an all in one content aggregator application built with Aurelia.

item.title: Mamuschka
item.description: Order the best chocolates in Argentina, pay online and get it right at your doorstep.

item.title: Markdown Editor
item.description: A fully-featured Markdown Editor built using Aurelia in a few short hours. It is built as an example for Aurelia book author Dwayne Charrington's upcoming book Aurelia For Real World Web Applications in which you build this application and get the source code for it.

item.title: Master the TOEFL
item.description: Master the TOEFL is the right place to practice your speaking and improve your TOEFL score!

item.title: Monterey
item.description: Monterey is an extensible application that provides a graphical user interface for a collection of tools to simplify the creation, configuration and maintenance of Aurelia applications

item.title: Mumble
item.description: Mumble is a self hosted secure chat application meant for businesses and teams to collaborate inspired by Slack.

item.title: Name My Band
item.description: A band name generator built using Aurelia.

item.title: netroStation
item.description:
Tired of typing URLs, struggling with finding links, or tied by limited bookmarks bar space? There's a better way!
netroStation makes browsing the Internet easier and more comfortable. All your favorite links are visually organized and available on your browser's homepage. It can help you be more productive at work, improve your browsing experience at home, and help you, your parents, or kids to be just a click away from websites you most often visit.

item.title: Northwind Breeze Demo
item.description: A Northwind application built with Aurelia and Breeze

item.title: Nowinfinity
item.description: NowInfinity has redefined SMSF Establishment and ASIC Company Management through outstanding cloud integration

item.title: Ployst
item.description:
Ployst is an experiment at building a new breed of team communications tool that goes beyond email and chat systems to offer the potential for focused, on topic and curated conversations.
(The marketing website is not built with Aurelia, but once you register, the app itself is a moderate sized aurelia application).

item.title: Pokego.run
item.description: Pokego.run is a Pokemon spotting map where you can record Pokemon sightings for others to discover.

item.title: PPOZO
item.description: A web application to manage students and the extracurricular activities taking place in the Amsterdam Zuid-Oost area.

item.title: Random Destiny Grimoire
item.description: A website to show a random grimoire card from the game Destiny. Uses Aurelia CLI

item.title: RobinsonC
item.description: Personal website that I made using Aurelia.

item.title: SeeCode.Run
item.description: An advance online editor.

item.title: Sentry
item.description: A dual-shell skeleton for handling a login screen. Created by @MatthewJames

item.title: Shopadoo
item.description: Shopadoo is a simple app for creating and using lists. It’s ideal for quick shopping lists, to do lists, holiday packing lists or anything else that you need to keep track of.

item.title: Solitaire
item.description: Klondike Solitaire built with Aurelia

item.title: stamp-web
item.description: Modern Stamp Management application written with Aurelia and NodeJS backend

item.title: Strengthen
item.description: The best way to track your movements and work with your trainer. Created by @TylerJPresley

item.title: Swan Example
item.description: Showcase of aurelia plugins, built with sails, waterline aurelia and node. Username: example, password: example.

item.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Mosaic Poster
item.description: An Aurelia application built using Webpack and Leaflet for exploring the movie poster for the upcoming Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles movie.

item.title: Tempfile.cloud
item.description: A temporary file storage service built using Aurelia and Node.js.

item.title: Time Tracker with Aurelia, Web.Api, Azure Db
item.description: A demo site with most of the features typically needed in a line of business application. These include token based security, web.api, azure db backend, password management, responsive bootstrap layout with minimum column widths (so its still usable on a phone), client and server side validation, error parsing and display.

item.title: vize.it
item.description: User interface for the Artificial Inteligence service to tag and classify images – with your own custom categories.

item.title: vojce
item.description: A social web application for creating and answering micro-polls. When discussing any kind of topic among your friends and you disagree in some matter, it could be interesting to find out what the general public thinks about it. Maybe it is about something important like the election, filosofical like life after death, useful like book review opinions or something completely absurd like what color the dress is. What if...? Would you rather...? What is most important...? The goal is to provide a platform where people not only can get direct result after anonymously voting on a poll, but can also filter the results to see statistics on certain properties of the voters like nationality, age and sex. People should be able to search for polls, follow them, add poll tags for filtering and discuss in the comments. The application is still in very early development. It is something I am working on in my spare time.

item.title: Web Audio Editor
item.description: A Web audio editor built using Aurelia in a couple of days by: https://github.com/jhewt

item.title: wpgg.LoL
item.description: League of Legends Champion builds, Counter builds, Summoner statistics and Champion statistics

item.description: The official website for the campaign of the limited ABSOLUT Buenos Aires bottle.
